data.title: Rooms of Residencia Real Castillo de Curiel in Curiel de Duero. Official Website.
data.meta_description: Rooms of Residencia Real Castillo de Curiel  in Curiel de Duero. Official Website. Every room in the hotel has magnificent views over the river Duero valley and the surrounding moors.
data.text:
Every room in the hotel has magnificent views over the river Duero valley and the surrounding moors. The hotel has got five suites and nineteen superior and standard double rooms.

The castle's guest rooms and facilities, absolutely ruined for centuries, have been restored aiming at a luxury relax for our guests: silence, nature, rest and an exquisite service will make your stay in one of the most significant medieval castles in Spain's History unforgettable.

The hotel has got a multimedia room suitable for business conferences, workshops and presentations, where up to forty attendants can feel at ease. In the dining room, for two hundred guests, can take place business meals, concerts or meetings. The hotel has got also several rooms for guests and group meetings, restaurant for sixty people, music and concerts room, etc.

Extra beds for children up to fourteen years: 30,00 â‚¬
